com.connectlife.coreserver.environment.device

Interface Device

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeviceJson

    public interface Device
    Device on the network. A device is a Accessory in the network.
    Author:
    ericpinet
    2016-01-23

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.clapi.data.Accessory getAccessory()
      Return the accessory linked with this device service.
      javax.jmdns.ServiceInfo getServiceInfo()
      Return the service info
      boolean isCharacteristicUpdated()
      Indicate if the device characteristic was changed since last load.
      boolean isRegister()
      Indicate if the device is register in the environment of the application.
      boolean isSyncronized()
      Indicate if the device is synchronized with the environment of the application.
      boolean register()
      Register the device with the application environment.
      boolean unregister()
      Unregister the device with the application environment.
      void unsynchronize()
      Unsynchronized the device with the environment.
      boolean updateEnvironment()
      Update the device data in the application environment.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessory

        com.clapi.data.Accessory getAccessory()
        Return the accessory linked with this device service.
        Returns:
        Accessory linked with this device.

      • getServiceInfo

        javax.jmdns.ServiceInfo getServiceInfo()
        Return the service info
        Returns:
        ServiceInfo of the device.

      • isRegister

        boolean isRegister()
        Indicate if the device is register in the environment of the application. If not, you can run the register().
        Returns:
        True if the device is correctly register with the application environment.

      • register

        boolean register()
        Register the device with the application environment. The device can be register if it's already setup in the environment.
        Returns:
        True if the device is correctly register with the application environment.

      • unregister

        boolean unregister()
        Unregister the device with the application environment. If device is unreachable on the network the unregister() will be call.
        Returns:
        True if the device is correctly unregister with the application environment.

      • unsynchronize

        void unsynchronize()
        Unsynchronized the device with the environment. The device manage will try to synchronize again.

      • isSyncronized

        boolean isSyncronized()
        Indicate if the device is synchronized with the environment of the application. If not, you can run the register().
        Returns:
        True if the device is correctly synchronized with the application environment.

      • updateEnvironment

        boolean updateEnvironment()
        Update the device data in the application environment.
        Returns:
        True if it correctly updated.

      • isCharacteristicUpdated

        boolean isCharacteristicUpdated()
        Indicate if the device characteristic was changed since last load.
        Returns:
        True is the characteristic was updated.
